content: Audit current dashboard tabs and identify mock data usage
Upgrade shadcn/ui to latest version and modernize styling
Convert Overview tab to real data with live portfolio metrics
Convert Trading tab to real data with live market feeds
Convert Agents tab to real data with live agent status
Convert Strategies tab to real data with actual strategy performance
Convert Portfolio tab to real data with live positions
Convert Analytics tab to real data with actual trading metrics
Convert Risk tab to real data with live risk calculations
Upgrade wallet integration with real balance tracking
Test all tabs for functionality and data connectivity
Polish UI/UX with modern design patterns
